desc.en: The sign of Xihu Line has been modified, and the transfer style of EPANGGONGNAN Station on Xihu Line has been changed (the transfer corridor between Xihu Line and Line 5 has been completed and put into use, and there is no need to transfer out of the station).
desc.zh-CN: 修改了西户线标识，更改了西户线阿房宫南站换乘样式（西户线与五号线换乘通道已建成并投入使用，无需出站换乘）

updateHistory.reason: Fix positions of FANG 2 LU and FANG 6 LU. Also fixing station translations.
Repaired signs. Change the style to Shanghai Metro style.
Repair the English translation of some metro stations.
There is a serious problem with the logo of Xihu Line.Need to modify
